data.DescriptionHtml:
An explosion of spheres of hardened ectoplasm occurs from a point you designate.
The spheres deal 1d6 points of bludgeoning damage per two caster levels (maximum 5d6) to creatures within the effect.
The ectoplasm decays into nothingness after the spell takes effect.
Material Component: A handful of resin marbles.
data.Name: Hail of Ectoplasm
